messages.title: It's time to build a brighter future
messages.content: For too many people, things aren’t working as they should be. Both the Conservatives and Labour are failing time and again to deliver a better future. The Liberal Democrats’ plan for government stands in stark contrast to the tired, divisive politics of Johnson and Corbyn’s Brexit Britain. The Liberal Democrats will stop Brexit and build a brighter future for the UK. Jo Swinson said, 'We have an ambitious plan for the future of our country, where every single person, every community and our planet can thrive.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give every child the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers and increase funding for schools.
Give mental health the same status as physical health.

Leading the fight to Stop Brexit.
Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030.
Give mental health the same status as physical health.
The Greens are supporting us to stop Brexit. Vote for the Liberal Democrats.
Both the Conservatives and Labour are failing time and again to deliver a better future.
Whether it’s the Conservatives’ hostile environment or Labour’s insistence to negotiate their own Brexit deal, both are failing our communities and allow hatred to spread.
We can build a brighter future for our country by stopping Brexit and building a fair, inclusive and green society.
Boris Johnson’s Conservatives - Making a mess out of Brexit.
Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour Party - Wants to negotiate his own Brexit deal.
